summary: Adds 5 custom standalone followers: Iridis the Battlemage, Solis the Sorceress, Cael the Archer, Aura the Warrior and Lumen the Assassin.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=6][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][SIZE=9][b]SKY Standalone Followers[/b][/font][/size][/size][/font]

[url=http://imgur.com/CZZmX0e][img]http://i.imgur.com/CZZmX0e.jpg[/img][/url][/center]
[center]Iridis The Imperial BattleMage
[i]Solis The Breton Sorcress[/i]
Cael The WoodElf Archer
[i]Aura The Redguard Warrior[/i]
Lumen The Nord Assassin[/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][b]
[size=6]Requirements[/size][/b]
[size=2]
-Skyrim Version 1.9.32.0.8 or higher.[/size]

[b][size=6]Installation [/size][/b]

Download and install with NMM or manually download and unpack the file and then move the “data” folder to your Skyrim data folder. 
This mod is not made for a torrented game, and If you have any problems using it with a torrent game, I will not provide support.

[b][size=6]Uninstallation [/size][/b]

Uninstall with NMM or manually delete all the files that came in the “data” folder listed in the mod.

[/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=6]Notes
[/size]
Each follower has customized combat, and I took the time to create a new individualized class for each follower. The followers are all named after a latin word, Iridis meaning rainbow, Solis meaning sun, Cael meaning sky, Aura meaning breeze, and Lumen meaning light. Each is fully standalone and marriageable. Unp, Cbbe, SeveNBase and BBP-TBBP body options are available. User photos are greatly appreciated, as well as endorsements if you enjoy the mod. 

[/font][size=6][/size][size=6]Where Can I find Them?[/size]

Iridis is in the [b]Bannered Mare (Whiterun)[/b]
[i]Solis is in the [b]Arcadia's Cauldron (Whiterun)[/b][/i]
Cael is in the [b]Temple of Kynereth (Whiterun)[/b]
[i]Aura is in [b]Warmaiden's (Whiterun)[/b][/i]
Lumen is in the [b]Hall of the Dead (Whiterun)

Optional Locations: College of Winterhold and Dragonsreach.

[/b][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=6]Mods Used in Screenshots[/size]
[/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54362/?]Somber Enb 3[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]aMidianBorn Book of Silence[/url]
[/size][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5696/?]Arise - Chapter 1 - The Black Sacrament[/url] (Dark Brotherhood armor replacer, used on Lumen, not included in file)
[/size]
[size=3]Recommended Mods
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57344/?]Simple Alchemist's Shack Overhaul[/url][/size]

[size=6]Credits[/size]

[size=2]dimon99 for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]Unp Body[/url]
Caliente for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Cbbe Body[/url]
Was[/size][/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=2]t1980 for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]SeveNBase Body[/url]
HelloSanta for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures[/url] and conversions of the hair meshes and textures from the SG hair pack
[/size][/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=2]LogRaam for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]Eyes Of Beauty[/url]
nevenbridge81 for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589/?]Natural Eyes[/url]
lthot for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url]
zzjay for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346/?]Smile in HD
[color=#f4f4f4]CherryHotaling for the [/color][/url][/size][/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4888/?]BBP T[/url][/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4888/?]BBP Body[/url][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346/?]
[/url][/size][/font]AlexSlesh for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31926/?]CBBE BBP TBBP body[/url][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346/?][color=#f4f4f4]
Testers: Datotherjew and fortydageekist
[/color][/url][/size][/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346/?]
